mapper.select: SELECT /* org.mt.mms.company.mapper.CompanyMapper.getCompany : COMP 상세조회 */ COMP_ID , COMP_NM , COMP_DIV , COMP_CEO_NM , COMP_TEL , COMP_ADDR , REGIST_USER_NAME , REGIST_DATE FROM COMP WHERE COMP_ID = #{compId}

SELECT /* org.mt.mms.company.mapper.CompanyMapper.selectCompanys : COMP 목록조회 */ COMP_ID , COMP_NM , COMP_DIV , COMP_CEO_NM , COMP_TEL , COMP_ADDR , REGIST_USER_NAME , REGIST_DATE FROM COMP WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY REGIST_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMP /* org.mt.mms.company.mapper.CompanyMapper.insertCompany : COMP 저장 */ ( COMP_ID , COMP_NM , COMP_DIV , COMP_TEL , COMP_CEO_NM , COMP_ADDR , REGIST_USER_NAME ) VALUES( CONCAT(date_format(NOW(), '%Y%m'), '02', 'A', 'CMP', NEXTVAL(HLOT_SEQ)), #{compNm}, #{compDiv}, #{compTel}, #{compCeoNm}, #{compAddr}, #{registUserName} )
mapper.update: UPDATE COMP /* org.mt.mms.company.mapper.CompanyMapper.deleteCompany : COMP 삭제 */ SET DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE COMP_ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT /* org.mt.mms.company.mapper.CompanyMapper.selectCompanyManagers : COMP_MNGER 목록조회 */ COMP_MNGER_ID , COMP_ID , COMP_MNGER_NM , COMP_MNGER_TEL , REGIST_USER_NAME , REGIST_DATE , DEL_YN FROM COMP_MNGER WHERE COMP_ID = #{compId} AND DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY REGIST_DATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE COMP_MNGER /* org.mt.mms.company.mapper.CompanyMapper.deleteCompanyAll : COMPANY 전체 삭제 */ SET DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE COMP_ID = #{id}
